content: हुम् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A particle (originally an imitative sound) expressing {@--1@} Remembrance or recollection; हुं ज्ञातं or रामो नाम बभूव हुं तदबला सीतेति हुम्. {@--2@} Doubt; चैत्रो हुं मैत्रो हुं. {@--3@} Assent; <ls>U. 5. 35.</ls> {@--4@} Anger. {@--5@} Aversion. {@--6@} Reproach. {@--7@} Interrogation. (In spells and incantations हुं is often found used with <ab>dat.</ab>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} ओं कवचायहुम्). (हुंकृ means ‘to utter the sound {%hum%}’, ‘to roar, grunt, bellow, as in अनुहुंकृ ‘to roar in return;’ अनुहुंकुरुते घनध्वनिं न हि गोमायुरुतानि केसरी <ls>Śi. 16. 25.</ls>).
